titles.title: TEST Act
A bill to clarify the requirements for receiving certain grants through the National Mental Health and Substance Use Policy Laboratory.
TEST Act
Testing, Evaluating, and Strengthening Treatments Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Testing, Evaluating, and Strengthening Treatments Act or the TEST Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2022 the National Mental Health and Substance Use Policy Laboratory grant program and otherwise revises the program, including by adding a matching funds requirement.
